caption.p: Pre-industrial cloud condensation nuclei concentrations. Annual mean pre-industrial cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) concentrations (cm −3) for the three main PI fire emission datasets (LMfire, SIMFIRE-BLAZE and CMIP6), and the percent change in the AeroCom, SIMFIRE-BLAZE and LMfire fire emission estimates compared to the CMIP6 dataset. CCN number concentrations are calculated at a supersaturation of 0.2% at 915 hPa (approximately cloud base for warm shallow, radiatively important clouds)
